value.title: How to get Secure Images in Power BI Reports
value.excerpt: Struggling getting images in your Power BI Report? Don't want to use anonymous URLs for the image? Patrick walks you through an approach to use secured images in your reports!  Show ‚Äúsecured‚Äù Images in Power BI https://pbi-guy.com/2021/11/17/show-secured-images-in-power-bi/  üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium
value.excerpt: In this video, Christian Wade joined Adam Saxton to discuss Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium. You can use Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium to take your dataset beyond 1GB and avoid failures such as timeouts.  Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium documentation - https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-premium-incremental-refresh

value.title: Parameters and Templates with Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows a way you can use parameters and templates, with Power BI Desktop, to provide prompts for your connection's server and database properties.   This is great for when you are creating a report, and need to share it with a customer that may have a different name for the server

value.title: Personal Gateway governance in Power BI
value.excerpt: Gateway sprawl in Power BI can be a problem for organizations looking to govern what data can be refreshed. Learn how you can govern the Personal Gateway to keep it under control.  Set-DataGatewayTenantPolicy PowerShell Reference https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/datagateway/set-datagatewaytenantpolicy?view=datagateway-ps

value.title: Power BI Admin Roles and the Admin Portal
value.excerpt: Adam looks at the Power BI Admin Portal and the roles you need to be able to access and manage your Power BI items. This consists of two potential roles within Azure Active Directory or Office 365.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba

value.title: Power BI and the On-premises Data Gateway: What is it?
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at the On-Premises Data Gateway. What is it exactly? This can be used with more than just Power BI. This includes PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, Azure Analysis Services and more. The entire Power Platform!   If you found this video helpful, we have a free cheat sheet for you for more

value.title: Power BI dataflows: One thing you probably missed with your gateway
value.excerpt: Adam looks at how you can get your gateway working with Power BI dataflows, even if you aren't an admin of the gateway. There is one thing that most people overlook. value.title: Power BI Desktop And Role-Playing Dimensions: Can you do it?

Patrick shows you why one particular way is not recommended as it will cause trouble. And then show you how you can use DAX within Power BI Desktop to take this to the next level.

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

value.title: Power BI User lookup with the gateway using Active Directory
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can use Active Directory custom attributes for the user lookup with the Power BI Gateway. This can be used for both Analysis Services mapping and the Kerberos SSO with DirectQuery connections.  Manage your data source - Analysis Services https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-gateway-enterprise-manage-ssas#usernames-with-analysis-services

value.title: Slicers vs. Slicer Pane vs. Filter Pane! Which is faster?
value.excerpt: You have different options in Power BI when it comes to slicers and filters. Just put the slicer on the report, use a slicer panel or have them in the filter pane. But which one is faster??? Patrick explores a few scenarios to think about!  Should you hide the filter pane in Power BI? https://greyskullanalytics.com/should-you-hide-the-filter-pane-in-power-bi/

value.title: Start your Power BI journey with Guy in a Cube
value.excerpt: Want to learn Power BI from the masters?   Coming from Microsoft Excel and not sure where to start? Or, maybe you've used Power BI but want to make sure you are doing the right thing. Guy in a Cube has a course for you!  Power BI Blueprint: A step-by-step guide to creating report with Power BI.  https://guyinacu.be/courses
